sn38.2:1.1: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘perfection’.
sn38.2:1.3: “Reverend, the ending of greed, hate, and delusion
sn38.2:1.5: “But, reverend, is there a path and a practice for realizing this perfection?”
sn38.2:1.8: “It is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:
sn38.2:1.9: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn38.2:1.10: This is the path, the practice, for realizing this perfection.”
sn38.2:1.11: “Reverend, this is a fine path, a fine practice, for realizing this perfection.
sn38.2:1.12: Just this much is enough to be diligent.”
